evidence.text: ORDER: Granting Motion to File Excess Pages 55 . Memoranda in support of summary judgment may not exceed 50 pages. This limitation includes headings, footnotes and quotations, but excludes the caption, table of contents, table of cases and authorities, signature block, exhibits, and any certificates of counsel.
